# Introduction

Crude oil is the world's largest traded commodity by dollar, amounting to x% of world commodities market. High oil price volatility (i.e. variance of the spot price over time) is a high-profile financial event, with broad reporting in the general media.

This research project is a characteristic study of oil price volatility and time series analysis.
